casebody.data:
IN RE GABRIELLA C.-G. et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 31, 2019

The petition by the respondent mother for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn.App. 767 , ___ A.3d ___ (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
